document_data.name: Esvena Dyrr
document_data.mainbody: '''Esvena Dyrr''' was a member of [[House Agrach Dyrr]] of [[Menzoberranzan]] until [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Esvena was the fourth daughter of matron mother [[Yasraena Dyrr]].
document_data.History: For their betrayal of [[Menzoberranzan]] during the [[Siege of Menzoberranzan]] during the [[Silence of Lolth]], her house's compound was besieged by [[House Xorlarrin]] and its allies. Esvena was present at the compound's bastions with her mother overseeing the situation. Yasraena discovered [[Gromph Baenre]]'s infiltration of their compound, but by then it was too late.
